thread.section_title: The Spain Event opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre The Spain Event | www.thespainevent.com
thread.title: Jo
thread.title_full: The Spain Event evaluado por Jo

author: Jo
title: Jo
text: We have just returned from a fantastic few days’ birthday celebrations in Madrid - made even more so by the lovely Sukie and Aaron from The Spain Event company. Their expert knowledge and organisational skills enabled us all to make the most of every minute - airport transfers, Tapas tour, fun packed I - pad Challenge and hilarious beer bikes experience to relaxing in the Plaza Mayor and taking in the views of this beautiful city – very highly recommended!
